targets.expr:
sum (
    min by (experiment, machine) (
        label_replace(probe_success{service=~"$experiment.*"}, "experiment", "$experiment", "experiment", "$experiment.*") OR
        label_replace(script_success{service=~"$experiment.*"}, "experiment", "$experiment", "experiment", "$experiment.*") OR
        label_replace(((node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="platform", mountpoint="/cache/data"} -
              node_filesystem_avail_bytes{cluster="platform", mountpoint="/cache/data"}) /
                node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="platform", mountpoint="/cache/data"}),
                "experiment", "$experiment", "", "") < bool 0.95 OR
        label_replace(kube_node_spec_taint{cluster="platform", key="lame-duck"}, "experiment", "$experiment", "", "") != bool 1 OR
        label_replace(lame_duck_experiment{cluster="platform"}, "experiment", "$experiment", "experiment", "$experiment.*") != bool 1 OR
        label_replace(gmx_machine_maintenance, "experiment", "$experiment", "", "") != bool 1
    )
)

panels.description: Distribution of distances between client and server fot NDT7 tests. Y axis shows distance in kilometers and X axis shows percentiles.

targets.rawSql:
WITH dist_locate AS (
  SELECT st_distance(st_geogpoint(server.Geo.Longitude, server.Geo.Latitude), st_geogpoint(client.Geo.Longitude, client.Geo.Latitude)) / 1000 as dist_in_kms_locate
  FROM `ndt.ndt7`, UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata) as metadata
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download is not NULL
    AND ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
      AND "v2" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
    AND server.Geo.Longitude IS NOT NULL
    AND server.Geo.Latitude IS NOT NULL
    AND client.Geo.Longitude IS NOT NULL
    AND client.Geo.Latitude IS NOT NULL
),

dist_others AS (
  SELECT ST_DISTANCE(ST_GEOGPOINT(server.Geo.Longitude, server.Geo.Latitude), ST_GEOGPOINT(client.Geo.Longitude, client.Geo.Latitude)) / 1000 AS dist_in_kms_others
  FROM `ndt.ndt7`
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download IS NOT NULL
    AND ( ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
        AND "v2_proxy" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
      OR ("locate_version" NOT IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)) )
    AND server.Geo.Longitude IS NOT NULL
    AND server.Geo.Latitude IS NOT NULL
    AND client.Geo.Longitude IS NOT NULL
    AND client.Geo.Latitude IS NOT NULL
),

percentiles_locate AS (
  SELECT approx_quantiles(dist_in_kms_locate, 10) dist_in_kms_locate
  FROM dist_locate
),

percentiles_others AS (
  SELECT approx_quantiles(dist_in_kms_others, 10) dist_in_kms_others
  FROM dist_others
),

unnest_percentiles_locate AS (
  SELECT dist_in_kms_locate AS locate, (RANK() OVER (ORDER BY dist_in_kms_locate ASC) - 1) * 10 AS percentile 
  FROM percentiles_locate, UNNEST(dist_in_kms_locate) AS dist_in_kms_locate
),

unnest_percentiles_others AS (
  SELECT dist_in_kms_others AS mlab_ns, (RANK() OVER (ORDER BY dist_in_kms_others ASC) - 1) * 10 AS percentile 
  FROM percentiles_others, UNNEST(dist_in_kms_others) AS dist_in_kms_others
)

SELECT locate, mlab_ns, unnest_percentiles_locate.percentile
FROM unnest_percentiles_locate JOIN unnest_percentiles_others ON (unnest_percentiles_locate.percentile = unnest_percentiles_others.percentile)
ORDER BY percentile

panels.title: Distance from Client to Server (NDT7)

panels.description: Median, min, and max number of NDT7 tests per site per metro. Y axis shows number of tests and X axis shows min, max, and median number of tests for sites within the metro.

targets.rawSql:
WITH agg_locate AS (
  SELECT SUBSTR(server.Site, 0, 3) AS metro, server.Site AS site, COUNT(*) AS total_tests
  FROM `ndt.ndt7`
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download is not NULL
    AND ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
      AND "v2" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
  GROUP BY metro,site
),

agg_other AS (
  SELECT SUBSTR(server.Site, 0, 3) AS metro, server.Site AS site, COUNT(*) AS total_tests
  FROM `ndt.ndt7`
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download IS NOT NULL
    AND ( ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
        AND "v2_proxy" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
      OR ("locate_version" NOT IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)) )
  GROUP BY metro,site
),

distribution_locate AS (
  SELECT MIN(total_tests) AS min_locate, MAX(total_tests) AS max_locate, APPROX_QUANTILES(total_tests, 100)[OFFSET(50)] AS p50_locate, metro
  FROM agg_locate
  GROUP BY metro
),

distribution_other AS (
  SELECT MIN(total_tests) AS min_other, MAX(total_tests) AS max_other, APPROX_QUANTILES(total_tests, 100)[OFFSET(50)] AS p50_other, metro
  FROM agg_other
  GROUP BY metro
)

SELECT p50_locate AS median_locate, p50_other AS median_mlab_ns, 
  min_locate, min_other AS min_mlab_ns,
  max_locate, max_other AS max_mlab_ns,
  distribution_locate.metro
FROM distribution_locate JOIN distribution_other ON (distribution_locate.metro = distribution_other.metro)

panels.title: Distribution of Number of Tests per Site in a Metro (NDT7)

panels.description: Number of NDT7 tests per machine at each site. Y axis shows the number of tests and X axis the machines at each site.

targets.rawSql:
WITH agg_locate AS (
  SELECT SUBSTR(server.Site, 0, 3) AS metro,
    server.Site AS site,
    COUNTIF(server.Machine LIKE '%mlab1%') AS mlab1_locate,
    COUNTIF(server.Machine LIKE '%mlab2%') AS mlab2_locate,
    COUNTIF(server.machine LIKE '%mlab3%') AS mlab3_locate,
    COUNTIF(server.machine LIKE '%mlab4%') AS mlab4_locate,
  FROM `ndt.ndt7`
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download is not NULL
    AND ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
      AND "v2" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
  GROUP BY metro,site
),

agg_other AS (
  SELECT SUBSTR(server.Site, 0, 3) AS metro,
    server.Site AS site,
    COUNTIF(server.Machine LIKE '%mlab1%') AS mlab1_mlab_ns,
    COUNTIF(server.Machine LIKE '%mlab2%') AS mlab2_mlab_ns,
    COUNTIF(server.machine LIKE '%mlab3%') AS mlab3_mlab_ns,
    COUNTIF(server.machine LIKE '%mlab4%') AS mlab4_mlab_ns,
    FROM `ndt.ndt7`
  WHERE date >= "2022-12-01"
    AND $__timeFilter(a.TestTime)
    AND raw.Download IS NOT NULL
    AND ( ("locate_version" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)
        AND "v2_proxy" IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Value))
      OR ("locate_version" NOT IN UNNEST(raw.Download.ClientMetadata.Name)) )
  GROUP BY metro,site
)

SELECT mlab1_locate, mlab1_mlab_ns,
  mlab2_locate, mlab2_mlab_ns,
  mlab3_locate, mlab3_mlab_ns,
  mlab4_locate, mlab4_mlab_ns,
  agg_locate.site
FROM agg_locate JOIN agg_other ON (agg_locate.site = agg_other.site)
